<% episodes.each do |episode| %>
mozaicfm <enclosure url="http://<%= episode.file %>" length="<%= episode.size %>" type="audio/mpeg" /> <%= episode.url %> <%= episode.url %> <%= episode.pubDate %> <%= episode.title %> | mozaic.fm Jxck <%= episode.duration %> no web,tech,it <%= episode.order %> <%= episode.subtitle %> <media:content url="https://<%= episode.file %>" fileSize="<%= episode.size %>" type="audio/mpeg" /> <%= episode.description %>
<% end %>
